phrases.phrase: 그녀의 재능을 피게 하는 연구 과제
meanings: a project that blooms her talents

meanings.meaning: keep up the rotation of blooms
Desire makes everything blossom; possession makes everything wither and fade.

vlive.korean: [당황] - 흡연... 왜요 담배피게 생겼어요? - 나와! [Surprised] - Why? Do I look like I would smoke? - It shows! 듣기 View video TRENDY TV(트렌디 티비) : [사다드림 시즌2] 도연 건강의 적신호?_8회
vlive.english: [Surprised] - Why? Do I look like I would smoke? - It shows!

vlive.korean: 안 돼 안 돼 나의 손발을 펴줄 사람이 아무도 없잖아요 내 몫이잖아요 맞죠? No, no. There's no one to make me feel better. That's up to me, right? 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 연락👋🏼
vlive.english: No, no. There's no one to make me feel better. That's up to me, right?

vlive.korean: 피는? - 피? What about "Fe?" - "Fe?" 듣기 View video ITZY : 믿감브🤟❤♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️
그 책 펴..그 뭐지? that book... What is that? 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [다영] 다영이의 요리교실🍳 Ep.11
'동백꽃 필 무렵'? "When the Camellia Blooms?" 듣기 View video AB6IX : 오랜만에 V✌

examples.korean: Desire makes everything blossom; possession makes everything wither and fade. (Marcel Proust) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 열망은 모든 것을 꽃 피게 하지만 소유는 모든 것을 시들고 스러지게 한다. (마르셀 프루스트, 돈명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Desire makes everything blossom; possession makes everything wither and fade. (Marcel Proust) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The topic provoked an interesting debate. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 화제는 토론에 꽃을 피게 했다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: The topic provoked an interesting debate. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They predict that unseasonably warm weather will cause flowers to bloom about a few days earlier than last year. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 때아닌 따뜻한 날씨 때문에 작년보다 며칠 앞당겨져서 꽃이 피게 될 것이라고 예상했습니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: They predict that unseasonably warm weather will cause flowers to bloom about a few days earlier than last year. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Meanwhile, romance blossoms between Yoo-gyeong and President Min(Masumi), a handsome man who resembles Terius from the cartoon, Candy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 한편 유경과 만화 ‘캔디’의 테리우스를 닮은 잘 생긴 민사장(마스이) 사이에는 로맨스가 꽃을 피게 된다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Meanwhile, romance blossoms between Yoo-gyeong and President Min(Masumi), a handsome man who resembles Terius from the cartoon, Candy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The ministry is also looking into banning tobacco companies from using words such as mild or light in their products as they may induce people to smoke. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 보건복지부는 또한 담뱃갑에 ‘부드러운’ 또는 ‘가벼운’이라는 단어들은 사람들로 하여금 담배를 피게 조장할 수 있기 때문에 담배회사들이 그러한 단어를 사용하지 못하도록 금지하는 방안을 검토하고 있다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: The ministry is also looking into banning tobacco companies from using words such as mild or light in their products as they may induce people to smoke. Add to Wordbook
